thread.title: Amazing Stay!
thread.title_full: Amazing Stay! - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: steevefoussard
title: Amazing Stay!
text:
The Viceroy Central Park is perfectly located in Midtown. Close to everything and to Central Park, but in a street that's calm and not too touristic.
The hotel in general and the room were perfectly cleaned. The Park Suite was incredible!
Special shout out to the front desk team, and especially Shaun. Amazing service. Always ready to help, knew everything about the hotel and the neighborhood. Always helping with a smile!
I definitely;y recommend this hotel for personal and business stays!
Room Tip: Park Suite has an amazing view of the park. See more room tips
